title: Exploring Thala Labs Ecosystem
description: Discover Thala Labs, a native DeFi ecosystem on Aptos offering stablecoin infrastructure, decentralized exchange, and yield-generating products across multiple verticals.

tasks.title: Prepare for DeFi Activities
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Thala's ecosystem

tasks.title: Thala Ecosystem Overview
tasks.description: Learn about the main components of Thala Labs
tasks.question: What are the main products in the Thala ecosystem?
options: Move Dollar stablecoin and Move DEX
tasks.correctAnswer: Move Dollar stablecoin and Move DEX

tasks.title: Move Dollar Stablecoin
tasks.question: What type of stablecoin is Move Dollar (MOD)?

tasks.title: Move DEX Design
tasks.question: What Automated Market Maker (AMM) model does Move DEX use?
options: Multiple pool types optimized for different pair types
tasks.correctAnswer: Multiple pool types optimized for different pair types

tasks.title: Thala Token (THL)
tasks.question: What is the primary purpose of the THL token?
options: Governance, staking rewards, and fee sharing
Required for all trades on Move DEX
Exclusively used for collateralizing Move Dollar
tasks.correctAnswer: Governance, staking rewards, and fee sharing

tasks.title: Security Features
tasks.description: Learn about how Thala secures user funds
tasks.question: How does Thala help ensure protocol security?
options: By leveraging Move's security features and formal verification
By limiting transactions during market volatility
tasks.correctAnswer: By leveraging Move's security features and formal verification

tasks.title: Liquidity Incentives
tasks.question: How does Thala typically incentivize liquidity providers?
options: Through THL emissions to specific liquidity pools
tasks.correctAnswer: Through THL emissions to specific liquidity pools

tasks.title: Protocol Governance
tasks.description: Learn how decisions are made in Thala protocol
tasks.question: Who makes governance decisions for the Thala protocol?

tasks.title: Composability
tasks.description: Understanding Thala's integration with other Aptos DeFi
tasks.question: How does Thala interact with other Aptos DeFi protocols?
options: It doesn't - Thala works completely independently
Through composable standards allowing MOD and LP tokens to be used across the ecosystem
tasks.correctAnswer: Through composable standards allowing MOD and LP tokens to be used across the ecosystem
